评论概述: I like it! but looks a like wrinkly and material is like under armor
评论详情: The white part of the shirt is wrinkly and it feels like the under armor brand or like a costume so I am afraid to iron it. but the black part is more like a regular shirt. Still it’s light and loose which in person. I got a medium size for a baggy effect. I’m 5’0 and 112 lbs :)

评论概述: Need to order a larger size
评论详情: This product is made smaller than expected.  Needed to have ordered it one size above normal size to get the baggy look in the product image.
Got this for my daughter and she loves it. The design is as pictured, which makes her very happy. Fits her well.
Good fit very comfortable a big hit with granddaughter

Super cute and looks just as pictured. Only thing is that the material is weird. It’s not t-shirt material but it isn’t bathing suit material either. If you have an aversion to textures, I’d pass on this.
Kid loves it and thats all that matters. Oh, and the great quality of the material and the design image are worth mentioning as well! It's worth the money.
Love the fit and feel of this shirt.
I didn't see the red on the listing but everything else is perfect, the material is soft and thin so it's really good for summer looks :)
The material turned out to be cheap. It’s cute but I just wish it was better quality.
Came quickly and just as described
Looks nothing like the picture. The sizing was fine, very thin/ cheap polyester cotton mix. Save your money is not worth it.
